page.title: 10A HONING AREA HOME
page.content: Our house is a brick and flint built semi-detached cottage. It contains 4 bedrooms,one living room,dining room, sitting room,kitchen and bathroom. It is home for a married couple and their two teenage children.The house is heated by an oil fired boiler , each room containing at least one radiator. In the living room is an open fire used at weekends and holidays,fuelled by wood and coal. The kitchen contains a central heating boiler, cooker, refrigerator, washing machine, sink unit, various free standing and wall mounted units, table and chairs. The bathroom contains a toilet, shower, bath,and sink. The living room contains 1 settee,3 easy chairs, T.V. piano,2 corner cupboards,1 occasional table.Dining room has table and chairs dresser and cupboard. Sitting room has a settee,bureau,Hi-Fi system,2 tables.
